Summary: A bright white orb descending quickly down. All the ay to earth, behind building. LArge. Not a shoting star, as it went very low.
divs: Sighting DetailsWaiting at stop light, facing North. Saw a large white light object descending quickly from up in sky, down to almost the ground, where I lost sight of it behind building. Went vertically down, not as any angle, like a shooting star would have, and which wold have burned out way higher in the atmosphere. This went all the way down, and was consistent in it's glow the entire way down. It seemed like a solid object moving at a rapid speed. It never impacted the ground, or broke the speed of sound (no sonic boom), from what I could hear.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Framingham
There were no other sightings in Framingham on or around May 18th 2013
